trans-unit.source: Enables the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior" /> for an endpoint through configuration.
trans-unit.target: Active <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior" /> pour un point de terminaison via la configuration.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement> is a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement> subtype that can be used to include the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior> on an endpoint through configuration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement> est un sous-type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement> qui peut être utilisé pour inclure <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior> sur un point de terminaison via la configuration.

trans-unit.source: There are no configurable properties on this element.
trans-unit.target: Cet élément ne comporte aucune propriété configurable.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>, in turn, allows an endpoint to be accessed by ASP.NET AJAX Web pages when it is configured with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: À son tour, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior> permet aux pages ASP.NET AJAX d'accéder à un point de terminaison lorsqu'il est configuré avec <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] how to enable a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service to respond to ASP.NET AJAX clients, see [Creating WCF Services for ASP.NET AJAX](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/creating-wcf-services-for-aspnet-ajax.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] comment activer un [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service pour répondre aux clients ASP.NET AJAX, consultez [création de Services WCF pour ASP.NET AJAX](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/creating-wcf-services-for-aspnet-ajax.md).

trans-unit.source: The following is an example of using this configuration element to configure a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] endpoint to be accessed by ASP.NET AJAX Web page.
trans-unit.target: L'exemple suivant indique comment utiliser cet élément de configuration pour configurer un point de terminaison [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] accessible par une page Web ASP.NET AJAX.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement" />.

trans-unit.source: The following sample returns the type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>.
Gets the type of the behavior enabled by this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: Obtient le type du comportement activé par cet élément de configuration.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> for the behavior enabled with the configuration element: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> correspondant au comportement activé avec l'élément de configuration : <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior" />.

trans-unit.source: The following sample returns the type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>.
